articles.author: https://www.facebook.com/bbcnews
articles.title: Elon Musk says X will fund legal bills if users treated unfairly by bosses - BBC
articles.description: Elon Musk says X will support those treated "unfairly" by bosses due to behaviour on Twitter - now X.
articles.content:
Elon Musk has said X, formerly known as Twitter, will pay the legal bills of anyone who is treated unfairly by their employer for their activity on his social media platform.
On Sunday, Mr Musk told… [+1051 chars]
